title: SHINE, 1996 - Dvd5  Spanish,English,German,French
description:
Solodvd org



Director: Mark Robson

Cast: Armin Mueller-Stahl, Noah Taylor, Geoffrey Rush, Justin Braine, Sonia Todd, Chris Haywood, Alex Rafalowicz, Gordon Poole

Length: 102 min

Video: Pal 4:3 1.33:1

Languages: Dolby Digital 5.1 Spanish, English, German, French

Subtitles: Holland, French

Synopsis: A riveting profile of Australian keyboard virtuoso David Helfgott (Geoffrey Rush) and his ultimate triumph over a domineering, abusive father (Armin Mueller-Stahl); schizophrenia; and an obsession with the all but unplayable Rachmaninoff Piano Concerto No. 3. Sir John Gielgud, superb as ever, plays Helfgott&#039;s tutor. Richly deserved Oscars went to Rush (Best Actor) and to Mueller-Stahl for his supporting turn.

Other features:Interactive Menus, Scene Access.

Dvd5 Untouched
